title: Patch 6.14 bringing ping issues
body: Since installing this new patch I have had games where some are 30-40ms ping and others jumping to 1500+. Over 2 years with the same internet I have never been over 130 ping. Is it just this patch? Reading through the boards I'm not the only person impacted by this.

replies.body: If the connection troubleshoot guide was unsuccessful, then your specific issue could be due to the route your ISP is taking to reach our servers.  Reach out to our tech team by[ submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and attach a [traceroute ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2)to help determine if this is the cause.  We'll be able to look into this further and find an option best for you.
Tried troubleshooting multiple times and nothing works. The ping was brought with this patch update.
[Utilise Riot’s Log Reader to see what’s happening with your network.]( https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)
